ing.item: Rosewater or orange flower water (scant teaspoons)

directions.step:
Peel and cube the apples. Place in the blender jar with sugar, perfumed water and milk. Whirl at high speed 15 seconds. Serve, with shaved ice if desired, in small glasses.
Yield: 2 to 4 servings.
From _Couscous and Other Good Food from Morocco_ by Paula Wolfert. New York: Harper & Row, Publishers, Inc., 1987. Pg. 326. ISBN 0-06-091396-7. Electronic format by Cathy Harned.
